title: Well done Dortmund - Font Type
content:
Hello,

I am looking for the font used on Ryanair's logojet for Borrussia Dortmund after the Champions League Final.

Here's what I am looking for:

[http://static.panoramio.com/photos/original/90822556.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417194612/http:/static.panoramio.com/photos/original/90822556.jpg "http://static.panoramio.com/photos/original/90822556.jpg")

Thanks for the help!

Chris
author: detaildude

comments.content:
It must be a font named **Bonnie's font** by Bonnie O'Keaffe but I can't find any legitimate source to acquire it

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417194612/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
Thanks a lot. Atleast a clue! :)
